jsx.ui
Class Toggle

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.Toggle
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnCheck, OnUncheck
public class Toggle
extends Widget
implements OnCheck, OnUncheck

A base class for toggle widgets.

A toggle widget is a Widget that toggles its display state by listening to a Checkable for Check and Uncheck events.

A Toggle widget is Configurable and is also an event source which fires Widget.Event events. It is meanwhile an event listener that handles events fired from its underlying component.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

listen

public void listen(Checkable c)

Listens to a checkable widget.

This adds listeners to listen to the checkable widget for Check and Uncheck events.

Parameters:
c - A checkable widget.
Since:
1.0

unlisten

public void unlisten(Checkable c)

Stops listening to a checkable widget.

This removes listeners for listening to the checkable widget for Check and Uncheck events.

Parameters:
c - A checkable widget.
Since:
1.0
